subject: Re: [junit] Classspath for ClassLoader
msgSnippet: on 12/20/00 8:05 AM, Benjamin Schroeder at schroeder@surfree.com wrote: A non-loading graphical test runner is available -- in JUnit 3.2 and earlier,
messageBody:
Re: [junit] Classspath for ClassLoader on 12/20/00 8:05 AM, Benjamin Schroeder at schroeder@... wrote:

A non-loading graphical test runner is available -- in JUnit 3.2 and earlier, junit.swingui.NonLoadingTestRunner will not reload classes.  Does that runner show the problem?

Oops: also meant to say that in JUnit 3.4, I think that the non-loading behavior has been moved to a property.  The documentation explains how.

---
Ben Schroeder
schroeder@...
